New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored a quick 53 off 28 balls.
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 7 runs in his 4 overs.
Afghanistan were bowled out for 134 runs.
Key Match Events: Afghanistan lost three wickets in the first five overs.
Suryakumar Yadav and Hardik Pandya formed a crucial 60-run partnership.
Axar Patel was run out on the last ball of the innings.
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan struggled with the run rate and couldn't chase the target.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was followed by another game in the Super Eights.
Indian bowlers performed impressively, especially Jasprit Bumrah.
Others: Live updates and the flow of the game were documented.
